title: Police: Teenager accidentally shot by friend in St. Augustine
content:
St. Augustine police are investigating an apparent accidental shotgun shooting of a 15-year-old boy Thursday.
Police said the victim, whose name was not released, was shot in the right leg and taken to UF Health Jacksonville.
Police said he was shot by a friend who was trying to hide the shotgun when it discharged. The shooting occurred about 8:30 p.m. on the first block of Spring Street.
Interviews with witnesses were continuing Friday.
Dana Treen: (904) 359-4091
